review: Easy to use and great access to all my shows!
author: Thi Kim Eichen

review: Its funny that prime works fine, but Netflix doesn't. Its OK, I guess.
author: Shauna Thompson

review: I'm having issues with my fire stick in that it "stalls out" every 90 seconds or so. Whenever I play music, games, or attempt to watch a movie, the media will pause after about 90 seconds and I have to press play to resume. How am I expected to watch a movie if I have to select play every 90 seconds????
author: Tar Heel Girl

review: It arrived on time and I'm very pleased with it so far.
author: Lisa Haumann

review: love it and great that it comes already set up for amazon prime acct.
author: Julie S. Houston

review: Works great. Bought a 2nd one. Will be great when we travel. Met all expectations.
author: S Spahn

review: It can't sustain a Internet connection, so unstable, no matter if using extension cord or put it next to the router, still have interferences for some reasons and glitches from time to time.
author: Cristian Gonzalez Perez "CGP"

review: Love it! The great feature is that no one can see it - no box showing! Another great feature besides easy to install is it comes with a very detailed map of what each button on the remote will do - no guessing! Thanks Amazon!!
author: MaryJo Biondo
